name: GAMETEST_1
description:
GAMETEST_1 is a beta project originally going to be called "Bob the Button Presser." Soon after development started, the creators one by one disappeared without a trace, never to be seen again. The project, loaded into a small package on a disc, was left with only the game's art. It has been ported for you to try now!

gTendo is not responsible for anything happening while playing the beta.
